section.section: With the advice and consent of the Senate, the Governor shall appoint a Hart-Miller-Pleasure Island Citizens Oversight Committee.
The terms and qualifications of members of the Oversight Committee shall be determined by the Governor.

text.section:
The Oversight Committee shall:
Monitor and provide oversight regarding:
The future development, use, and maintenance of the Hart-Miller-Pleasure Island chain; and
The water quality immediately surrounding the islands; and
Hear and dispose of complaints lodged by individuals affected by the future development and the water quality immediately surrounding the Hart-Miller-Pleasure Island chain.
